alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 06 at 5:43AM AKDT until July 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR DELTANA AND TANANA FLATS... * AFFECTED AREA...Deltana and Tanana Flats. * TIMING...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * WINDS...Southeast 15 mph to 25 mph with gusts to 30 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs 78 to 88. * IMPACTS...Fires could spread rapidly this afternoon and evening. South winds will increase to 15 mph across much of the area this afternoon and continue into this evening. Near Delta Junction winds will increase to 25 mph gusting to 35 mph this afternoon. Winds are expected to decrease across the area late tonight, with RH going above 30% and remaining above 30% Fri. Sat will be wetter and cooler.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
